Posts.Content: Mar 14, 2009 02:25PM may8 wrote: Hi Roseanne--how did the scan turn out?  I had the exact symptoms as you--shoulder hurt--hard to lift that arm and much much worse at night.  I did a ct guilded biopsy which isn't that bad.  The breast cancer had returned to my shoulder blade.  I am due to start radiation when Kaiser arranges it.  Hope yours is  not cancer.  xoxo--may8
